attributes.action: ensure all ex-servicemen and women are treated equally for the receipt of service pensions and demand that the government reviews the regulations which mean that anyone who retired from HM forces with less than 22 years service prior to April 1975 receives no pension at all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I served in the RAF for 14 years and during that time there was a retention of salary pending payment of a pension.  Despite the fact that I was put in for an award in conjunction with the Queen's Birthday Honours List I was told six months later I would not be allowed to sign on for a pensionable engagement as a quota system prevented this.  Basically I had received accelerated promotion, done a good job and there was no room  in MoD's plans for someone of my rank based on their projected requirement.  This is, to me, an iniquitous situation and goes against natural justice.
